short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Zoom in on images by hovering over them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily zoom in on images while browsing the web with the Image Zoom extension! Whether you're admiring high-resolution photos, analysing details, or simply viewing content more clearly, this extension makes it effortless.
Key Features:
•	Smooth Hover Zoom: Simply hover over any image to zoom in seamlessly.
•	Customisable Zoom Level: Enhance or reduce the zoom level to match your preferences.
•	Lightweight and Fast: The extension is optimised for speed and doesn’t slow down your browsing.
•	No Clutter: Works in the background without intrusive pop-ups or buttons.
•	Universal Compatibility: Works on any website with images
